channel.title: math.MG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.MG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Examples of aspherical Alexandrov spaces
item.description: arXiv:2504.20779v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We construct examples of 3-dimensional compact aspherical Alexandrov spaces without boundary which are not topological manifolds.
item.dc:creator: Michael Kapovich

item.title: On the lower bound of the curvature exponent on step-two Carnot groups
item.description: arXiv:2504.20005v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: In this work, we show that there exists a step-two Carnot group on which the new lower bound of the curvature exponent given in arXiv:2308.15811v2 can be strictly less than the curvature exponent by studying the convergence of the structure constants of Lie algebra.
item.dc:creator: Ye Zhang
